channel.title: Containerd on devopstales
channel.description: Recent content in Containerd on devopstales

item.title: Install kubernetes with kubeadm
item.description: Kubeadm is a tool that helps you bootstrap a simple Kubernetes cluster and simplifies the deployment process.

item.title: Hardening Kubernetes with seccomp
item.description: In this post I will attempt to demystify the relationship of seccomp and Kubernetes This first part will look at containers and pods.

item.title: How to deploy containerd with Firecracker?
item.description: In this post I will show you how you can install and use kata-container with Firecracker engine in kubernetes.

item.title: How to deploy containerd with gVisor?
item.description: In this post I will show you how you can install and use gvisor engine in kubernetes.

item.title: How to deploy containerd with kata containers?
item.description: In this post I will show you how you can install and use kata-container engine in kubernetes.

item.title: Migrate Kubernetes from docker to containerd
item.description: In this post I will show you how you can migrate your kubernetes cluster from docker to containerd.

item.title: Kubernetes deprecated Docker? Containderd is the new Docker!!
item.description: Docker is now deprecated in Kubernetes in the next 1.20 version, but thet dose no mean yo can not run containers wit docker.

item.title: Container runtimes
item.description: One of the terms you hear a lot when dealing with containers is “container runtime”. This post will explain what container runtimes are.
